description.narrative: SAWDF organized a three day “International Women Entrepreneurs Summit - 2018” with the theme “Equality begins with Economic Empowerment”, from 3rd – 5th September, 2018 in Kathmandu, Nepal.

activity-date.narrative: The summit had the attendance of representatives from over twenty-seven countries from the UK, USA, The People’s Republic of China, SAARC, ASEAN, EU, African, and the Arab regions. Over a hundred of women entrepreneurs, not only from Kathmandu but from other districts also participated at the international summit.

department.narrative: South Asian Women Development Forum (SAWDF) is a SAARC recognized body, representing over 30 national women entrepreneur associations, federations and chambers, working towards the economic issues of women entrepreneurs in the SAARC and ASEAN regions.
